description: Video content creator specializing in educational tutorials, short-form content, and multi-platform video strategy with focus on YouTube, TikTok, Instagram Reels, and professional portfolio showcases

SKL-VID-002.skill_phrase: created viral short-form content for TikTok and Reels

SKL-VID-003.skill_phrase: conducted live streaming sessions and Q&A

SKL-VID-004.skill_phrase: edited professional showreels for Vimeo portfolio

SKL-VID-005.skill_phrase: optimized video content for SEO and discovery

SKL-VID-008.skill_phrase: integrated AI tools ethically in video production workflow

tool_details.TOOL-VID-001: YouTube - PRIMARY platform (weekly use) - Long-form tutorials, shorts, live streams
tool_details.TOOL-VID-002: Vimeo - PRIMARY platform (monthly use) - Professional showreels, client review
tool_details.TOOL-SMM-001: Instagram - PRIMARY platform (daily use) - Reels, IGTV, Stories
tool_details.TOOL-SMM-003: TikTok - SECONDARY platform (daily use) - Viral short-form content
tool_details.TOOL-PORT-001: Behance - SECONDARY platform (monthly use) - Video project case studies
tool_details.TOOL-SMM-005: Pinterest - SECONDARY platform (weekly use) - Video thumbnails, storyboards
tool_details.TOOL-SMM-007: LinkedIn - SECONDARY platform (weekly use) - Professional video content

workflow_details.WF-SMM-006: YouTube Tutorial Production - Long-form comprehensive educational videos
workflow_details.WF-SMM-007: Short-Form Video Production - TikTok/Reels/Shorts daily content creation
workflow_details.WF-SMM-001: Cross-Platform Content Distribution - Repurpose YouTube to TikTok/Reels/Instagram
workflow_details.WF-SMM-002: Content Repurposing Pipeline - Transform long-form to multiple short-form variations

object_details.OBJ-SMM-008: YouTube Tutorial - Long-form educational video (10-45 minutes, 1080p-4K)
object_details.OBJ-SMM-009: YouTube Short - Vertical short-form video (60 seconds max, 9:16 format)
object_details.OBJ-SMM-007: TikTok Video - Short-form vertical video (15-60 seconds, 9:16 format)
object_details.OBJ-VID-001: Vimeo Showreel - Professional portfolio showcase (60-90 seconds, 4K)
object_details.OBJ-VID-002: Video Case Study - Project documentation with behind-the-scenes

template_details.TMPL-VID-001: YouTube Video Description Template - SEO-optimized with timestamps and links
template_details.TMPL-VID-002: Video Script Template - Hook → Problem → Solution → Examples → CTA structure
template_details.TMPL-VID-003: YouTube Community Post Template - Engagement-focused announcements

typical_tasks: Record 1-2 YouTube tutorials per week (10-45 minutes each)
Create 5-10 short-form videos daily (TikTok, Reels, Shorts)
Edit and render high-quality video content for multiple platforms
Conduct weekly live streaming sessions for community engagement
Optimize video titles, descriptions, and tags for SEO
Create custom thumbnails for YouTube videos (A/B tested)
Script and storyboard educational content in advance
Repurpose long-form content into short-form clips
Update Vimeo showreel monthly with best work
Engage with community through comments and responses daily

performance_metrics.youtube_watch_time: Primary metric - Total minutes watched across channel
performance_metrics.youtube_ctr: Click-through rate on thumbnails - Discovery effectiveness
performance_metrics.tiktok_completion_rate: Percentage who watch to end - Most important for algorithm

best_practices: YouTube: Custom thumbnails A/B tested, keyword-first titles, 200+ word descriptions
YouTube: Always include captions for accessibility
YouTube: Hook within first 15 seconds to retain viewers
TikTok: Hook within first 3 seconds - critical for completion rate
TikTok: Vertical 9:16 format fills entire mobile screen
TikTok: Add text overlays/captions (many watch without sound)
Reels: Use trending audio when relevant to content
Reels: Keep tight editing - fast-paced content performs better
Cross-platform: Repurpose long-form to short-form for efficiency
Cross-platform: Maintain consistent branding across all platforms
SEO: Optimize video titles, descriptions, tags with keywords
Community: Respond to comments within first hour of posting
Quality: 1080p minimum, 4K preferred for professional content
Workflow: Batch record and edit content for efficiency
AI Integration: Show transparent AI + Human workflow

ai_integration_approach.transparency: Always show human + AI collaboration in video production
ai_integration_approach.process: Human concept → AI-assisted editing/effects → Human refinement → Final video
ai_integration_approach.documentation: Document AI tool usage in video descriptions and process videos

platform_sensitivity.general: AI as assistant narrative for efficiency, not replacement

content_repurposing_workflow.step_2: Extract 5-10 key moments for short-form content
content_repurposing_workflow.step_3: Edit vertical versions for TikTok, Reels, Shorts
content_repurposing_workflow.step_4: Create custom captions and hooks for each platform
content_repurposing_workflow.step_6: Post to YouTube first, then distribute short-form within 24 hours
content_repurposing_workflow.step_7: Cross-promote YouTube tutorial via short-form previews
content_repurposing_workflow.step_8: Engage with comments across all platforms daily

posting_schedule.youtube: 1-2 long-form tutorials per week + 1-3 Shorts daily
posting_schedule.tiktok: 1-3 videos per day for algorithm favor
